SA11sanss13u:4: punar aparaṃ kulaputra bodhisatvâivaṃ kāye smṛtim upasthāpayati /
SA11sanss13u:17: tasya kāyaparijñānahetor na bhūyaḥ kvacit smṛtiḥ prasarati /
SA11sanss13u:28: āgantukair vyavahārair vyavahriyate kāyêti dehêti bhogêti āśrayêti śarīram iti kuṇapêti āyatanam iti /
SA11sanss13u:32: anityo vatâyaṃ kāyo 'cirasthitiko maraṇaparyavasānêti jñātvā na kāyahetor viṣamayā jīvati /
SA11sanss13u:38: so 'nityaḥ kāyêti sarvasatvānāṃ dāsatvaśiṣyatvam abhyupagamya kiṅkaraṇīyatāyai utsuko bhavati /
SA11sanss13u:39: anityaḥ kāyêti sarvakāya doṣavaṅkaśāṭhyakuhanāṃ na karoti /
SA11sanss13u:40: anityaḥ kāyêti jīvitenâśvāsaprāpto jīvitahetor api pāpaṃ karma na karoti /
SA11sanss13u:41: anityaḥ kāyêti bhogeṣu tṛṣṇâdhyavasānaṃ na karoti /
SA11sanss13u:43: punar aparaṃ kulaputra bodhisatvaḥ kāye kāyânudarśanasmṛtyupasthānaṃ bhāvayan sarvasatvakāyāṃs tatra svakāyae upanibadhnāti /
SA11sanss13u:46: yathā ca tathāgatakāye nâśravas tathā svakāyadharmatāṃ pratyavekṣate /
SA11sanss13u:47: so nâśravadharmatākuśalaḥ sarvasatvakāyān api tallakṣaṇān eva prajānātîty ādi //
SA11sanss13u:49: yad utâyaṃ kāyo 'nupūrvasamudāgato 'nupūrvavināśo paramâṇusaṃcayaḥ śuṣirônnāmâvanāmau navavraṇamukharomakūpasrāvī valmīkavadāsīviṣanivāsaḥ [[DOUBT]] /
SA11sanss13u:86: prajñāyamānaḥ sa hi bālabuddhiḥ viṣṭhāghaṭaṃ yāti vahan vicetāḥ //
SA11sanss13u:93: yāti kṣayaṃ nâiva tu śuklabhāvaṃ bālasya buddhir vitathâbhimānā //
SA11sanss13u:94: evaṃ hi yaḥ caukṣamatir manuṣyaḥ caukṣaṃ kariṣye 'ham idaṃ śarīram /
SA11sanss13u:95: sûdvartitaṃ tīrthaśatâbhiṣiktaṃ yāti kṣayaṃ mṛtyuvaśād acaukṣam //
SA11sanss13u:98: prasravan bodhisatvena kāyaḥ pratyavekṣitavyo nava vraṇamukhair yāvat /
SA11sanss13u:106: asvâdhīno bodhisatvena kāyaḥ pratyavekṣitavyaḥ annapānasaṃbhūtêti vistaraḥ //
SA11sanss13u:108: vedanā smṛtyupasthānaṃ tu yathā tāvad āryaratnacūḍasūtre /
SA11sanss13u:109: iha kulaputra bodhisatvo vedanāsu vedanânupaśyanāsmṛtyupasthānaṃ bhāvayan veditasukhâśriteṣu satveṣu mahākaruṇāṃ pratilabhate /
SA11sanss13u:111: tat sukhaṃ yatra veditaṃ nâsti sa sarvasatvaveditaprahāṇāya vedanāsu vedanāsmṛtyupasthānaṃ bhāvayati /
SA11sanss13u:116: sa yāṃ kāṃcid vedanāṃ vedayate tāṃ sarvāṃ mahākaruṇāparigṛhītāṃ vedayate /
SA11sanss13u:117: sa yadā sukhāṃ vedanāṃ vedayate tadā rāgacariteṣu satveṣu mahākaruṇāṃ pratilabhate ātmanaś ca rāgânuśayaṃ pratijahāti /
SA11sanss13u:118: yadā duṣkhāṃ vedanāṃ vedayate tadā dveṣacariteṣu satveṣu mahākaruṇāṃ pratilabhate ātmanaś ca doṣânuśayaṃ prajahāti /
SA11sanss13u:119: yadâduṣkhâsukhāṃ vedanāṃ mohacariteṣu satyeṣu mahākaruṇāṃ pratilabhate /
SA11sanss13u:128: sa yāṃ kāñcid vedanāṃ vetti sarvāṃ tām anityaveditāṃ vetti /
SA11sanss13u:134: iti hi yat sukhaṃ tad anityaṃ yad duṣkhaṃ sukham eva tat /
SA11sanss13u:135: yad aduṣkhâsukhaṃ tad anātmakam ity ādi //
SA11sanss13u:137: duṣkhayā vedanayā spṛṣṭaḥ sarvapāpâkṣaṇôpapanneṣu satveṣu mahākaruṇām utpādayati //
SA11sanss13u:138: pe //api tu khalu punar abhiniveśo vedanā parigraho vedanôpādānaṃ vedanôpalambho vedanā viparyāso vedanā vikalpo vedanêty ādi //
SA11sanss13u:142: vedako vedanād anyaḥ pṛthagbhūto na vidyate //
SA11sanss13u:144: yathā bodhis tathā hy eṣā śāntā śuddhā prabhāsvarā //
SA11sanss13u:149: rajyati vā duṣyati vā muhyati vā /
SA11sanss13u:156: cittaṃ hi kāśyapa nâdhyātmaṃ na bahirdhā nôbhayam antareṇôpalabhyate /
SA11sanss13u:157: cittaṃ hi kāśyapârūpam anidarśanam apratigham avijñaptikam apratiṣṭham
SA11sanss13u:160: cittaṃ hi kāśyapa sarvabuddhair na dṛṣṭaṃ /
SA11sanss13u:161: na paśyanti na drakṣyanti yat sarvabuddhair na dṛṣṭaṃ /
SA11sanss13u:165: cittaṃ hi kāśyapa māyāsadṛśam abhūtaparikalpanayā vividhām upapattiṃ parigṛhṇāti //pe //
SA11sanss13u:166: cittaṃ hi kāśyapa nadīsrotaḥsadṛśam anavasthitam utpannabhagnavilīnaṃ /
SA11sanss13u:167: cittaṃ hi kāśyapa dīpârcciḥsadṛśaṃ hetupratyayatayā pravartate /
SA11sanss13u:169: cittaṃ hi kāśyapâkāśasadṛśam āgantukaiḥ kleśair upakliśyate /
SA11sanss13u:172: cittaṃ hi kāśyapa matsyabaḍiśasadṛśaṃ duṣkhe sukhasaṃjñayā /
SA11sanss13u:181: cittaṃ hi kāśyapa sparśârāmaṃ makṣikêva tailapātre /
SA11sanss13u:182: cittaṃ hi kāśyapa parigaveṣyamāṇaṃ na labhyate /
SA11sanss13u:184: yan nôpalabhyate tan nâivâtītaṃ nânāgataṃ na pratyutpannaṃ /
SA11sanss13u:185: yan nâivâtītaṃ nânāgataṃ na pratyutpannaṃ tat tryadhvasamatikrāntaṃ /
SA11sanss13u:186: yat tryadhvasamatikrāntaṃ tan nêvâsti na nâstîty ādi //
SA11sanss13u:189: sa cittaṃ parigaveṣamāṇo nâdhyātmaṃ cittaṃ samanupaśyati /
SA11sanss13u:196: tasyâivaṃ bhavati ālambane sati cittam utpadyate /
SA11sanss13u:198: atha yad evâlambanaṃ tad eva cittaṃ /
SA11sanss13u:199: yadi tāvad anyad ālambanam anyac cittaṃ /
SA11sanss13u:201: atha yad evâlambanaṃ tad eva cittaṃ /
SA11sanss13u:207: na tenâivâṅguly-agreṇa tad evâṅguly-agraṃ spraṣṭuṃ śakyate /
SA11sanss13u:208: nâiva cittena tad eva cittaṃ śakyate draṣṭum //
SA11sanss13u:209: pe //punar aparaṃ kulaputra yad upadrutapradrutânavasthitapracārasya vānaramārutasadṛśasya /
SA11sanss13u:211_1: cittasyâvasthānām ekâgratâśaraṇam aviśaraṇaṃ śamathâikâgratâvikṣepêty ucyate cittasya smṛtir iti //
SA11sanss13u:219: yat punaḥ sarvasvaṃ parityajya sarvabuddhakṣetrapariśuddhaye pariṇāmayatîtîyam ucyate viṭhapanêty ādi //
SA11sanss13u:222: dharme dharmânudarśī viharan bodhisatvo na kañcid dharmaṃ samanupaśyati /
SA11sanss13u:223: yato na buddhadharmā yato na bodhiḥ /
SA11sanss13u:224: yato na mārgo yato na niḥsaraṇaṃ /
SA11sanss13u:225: sa sarvadharmâniḥsaraṇam iti viditvânāvaraṇaṃ nāma mahākaruṇāsamādhiṃ samāpadyate /
SA11sanss13u:226: sa sarvadharmeṣu sarvakleśeṣu ca kṛtrimasaṃjñāṃ pratilabhate /
SA11sanss13u:233: na rāgabhāvo na dveṣabhāvo na mohabhāva /
SA11sanss13u:235: yat svabhāvāś ca kleśās tat svabhāvā bodhir ity evaṃ smṛtim upasthāpayatîti //
SA11sanss13u:237: iha kulaputra bodhisatvasya dharme dharmânupaśyanā smṛtyupasthānena viharatâivaṃ bhavati /
SA11sanss13u:240: na punar atra kaścid ātmabhāve satvo vā jīvo vā jantur vā poṣo vā puruṣo vā pudgalo vā manujo vā yo jāyate vā jīryate vā cyavate vôtpadyate vā /
SA11sanss13u:247: yante tādṛśāḥ samudāgacchanti kuśalā vâkuśalā vā
SA11sanss13u:251: na câhetukānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ kācid utpattir ity ādi //
SA11sanss13u:253: sa kiyadgambhīrān api dharmān pratyavekṣamāṇas tāṃ sarvajñatābodhicittânusmṛtiṃ na vijahāti //
SA11sanss13u:257: saṃskāra pralopa dharmime varṣakāli calitaṃ vilepanaṃ /
SA11sanss13u:264: hetūbhi ca pratyayebhi vā sarva saṃskāragataṃ pravartate /
SA11sanss13u:265: anyonyapratītyahetutaḥ tad idaṃ bālajano na budhyate //
SA11sanss13u:266: yathā muñja pratītya balbajaṃ rajju vyāyāmabalena vartitā /
SA11sanss13u:267: ghaṭiyantra sacakra vartate teṣv ekâikaśu nâsti vartanā //
SA11sanss13u:270: bījasya sato yathâṅkuro na ca yo bīja sa câivâṅkuro /
SA11sanss13u:271: na cânya tato na câiva tat /
SA11sanss13u:274: saṃskārâvidyapratyayāḥ te ca saṃskāra na santi tatvataḥ /
SA11sanss13u:275: saṃskārâvidya câiva hi śūnyâite prakṛtī nirīhakāḥ //
SA11sanss13u:276: mudrāt pratimudra dṛśyate mudrasaṃkrānti na côpalabhyate /
SA11sanss13u:277: na ca tatra na câiva sānyato evaṃ saṃskāranucchedaśāśvatāḥ //
SA11sanss13u:278: cakṣuś ca pratītya rūpataḥ cakṣu vijñānam ihôpajāyate /
SA11sanss13u:279: na ca cakṣuṣi rūpaniśritaṃ rūpasaṃkrānti na câiva cakṣuṣi //
SA11sanss13u:280: nairātmyaśubhāś ca dharmime te punar ātmêti śubhāś ca kalpitāḥ /
SA11sanss13u:283: akahiñci gatam anāgataṃ śūnya māyôpama yogi paśyati //
SA11sanss13u:288: iti pratyayato 'gni jāyate jātu kṛtukāryu laghū nirudhyate //
SA11sanss13u:289: atha paṇḍitu kaści mārgate kuta yam āgatu kutra yāti vā /
SA11sanss13u:290: vidiśo diśi sarva mārgato na gatir nâpy agatiś ca labhyate //
SA11sanss13u:292: sāmagri tu satvasūcanā sā ca paramârthatu nôpalabhyate //
SA11sanss13u:293: kaṇṭhâuṣṭha pratītya tālukaṃ jihva parivartir avarti akṣarā /
SA11sanss13u:294: na ca kaṇṭhagatā na tālukaiḥ akṣarâikâika tu nôpalabhyate //
SA11sanss13u:295: sāmagripratītyaś ca sā vācam anubudhivaśena niścarī /
SA11sanss13u:298: kṣaṇikāṃ vaśikāṃ tad īdṛśīṃ sarvavācaḥ pratiśrutakôpamāḥ //
SA11sanss13u:300: yatha tantri pratītya dāru ca hastavyāyāmatrayebhi saṃgatim /
SA11sanss13u:302: atha paṇḍitu kaści mārgate kuto 'yam āgatu kutra yāti vā /
SA11sanss13u:303: vidiśo diśa sarvamārgataḥ śabdam anāgamanaṃ na labhyate //
SA11sanss13u:304: tatha hetubhi pratyayebhi ca sarvasaṃskāragataṃ pravartate /
SA11sanss13u:305: yogī puna bhūtadarśanāt śūnya saṃskāra nirīha paśyati //
SA11sanss13u:310: śūnyatā na kvacid devā na nāgā nâpi rākṣasāḥ //
SA11sanss13u:311: manuṣyā vâmanuṣyā vā sarve tu eṣa vidyate /
SA11sanss13u:312: nāmnā hi nāmatā śūnyā nāmni nāma na vidyate //
SA11sanss13u:313: anāmakāḥ sarve dharmāḥ nāmnā tu paridīpitāḥ //
SA11sanss13u:314: yo hi svabhāvo nāmno vai na sa dṛṣṭo na ca śrutaḥ /
SA11sanss13u:315: na côtpanno niruddho vā kasya nāmêha pṛcchasi //
